body.bibl: Geller, Markham Judah. “The Longevity of Akkadian: Clues from Syriac Magic at Nippur.” In The Frau Professor Hilprecht Collection of Babylonian Antiquities: Essays Dedicated to Manfred Krebernik during the Colloquium Held on March 17–18, 2022 at Friedrich Schiller University Jena, edited by Jacob Jan de Ridder and Peter Stein, 89–94. Texte Und Materialien Der Frau Professor Hilprecht Collection 14. Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz Verlag, 2023.
